content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Installation of Matplotlib
If you have
Python
and
PIP
already installed on a system, then installation of 
Matplotlib is very easy.
Install it using this command:
C:\Users\
Your Name
>pip install matplotlib
If this command fails, then use a python distribution that already has Matplotlib installed,  like Anaconda, Spyder etc.
Import Matplotlib
Once Matplotlib is installed, import it in your applications by adding the
import
module
statement:
import matplotlib
Now Matplotlib is imported and ready to use:
Checking Matplotlib Version
The version string is stored under
__version__
attribute.
Example
import matplotlib
print(matplotlib.__version__)

Note:
two underscore characters are used in
__version__
.

★
+1
